title: Hour 3 - Adam Sandler (06-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Adam Sandler (06-22-20)
description:
Adam Sandler tells Dan that they are working on the movie that Lebron is producing; but that there is no production going on with covid-19. Adam says Tom Petty showed up at his wedding to use the phone because Tom had been in a car accident.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
